In the future, this could be a protected admin interface.

get.description:
Return ranked diagnosis term suggestions (name + synonyms).
Placed before /{term_id} route to avoid path param capture precedence issues.

schema.title: Response Suggest Terms Diagnosis Terms Suggest Get
Response Read Diagnosis Terms Diagnosis Terms  Get
Response List Synonyms Diagnosis Terms Synonyms Get

get.description:
Lightweight check used by UI when user clicks game card to know if report is available.
Returns {available: bool, reason?: str}
Return all finalized BlockFeedback rows for the user ordered by block_index.

schema.title: Response List Completed Reports Game Reports Get

post.description:
Return the next incomplete assignment in the active block, or start a new block if finished.

Response shape:
{
  "status": "continuing" | "started" | "exhausted",
  "block_index": int | null,
  "assignment": ReaderCaseAssignment | null,
  "remaining": int  # remaining (including this one) in current block when continuing
}
